r.n:
A new release of Piece_Unity_Component_Flexy is now available.
What's New in Piece_Unity_Component_Flexy 1.3.0
* Piece_Unity_Service_Rendering_Flexy: Piece_Unity_Service_Rendering_Flexy allows you to use HTML_Template_Flexy in actions and plug-ins. * Improved custom controller handling: The behavior of the Renderer_Flexy plug-in has been changed to instantiate a controller once.
